item.title: Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 23, 2024 predicts significant changes - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 23, 2024

Date: December 23, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Today is a promising day for Pisces, filled with opportunities for personal growth, love, career advancements, and financial insights. It encourages embracing changes positively.

  • Personal growth is emphasized; focus on self-improvement.
  • Open communication will enhance relationships.
  • Career prospects are encouraging; be proactive and confident.
  • Careful financial management is recommended; reassess budget and goals.
  • Prioritize health through exercise and balanced diet.
“Small gestures of affection can make a big difference, so be attentive and considerate towards your partner's needs.”

This horoscope encourages Pisces to remain open to the positive changes and opportunities that today may bring.

item.title: Genelia D'Souza responds to Sonam Kapoor's 'these people' remark - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Genelia D'Souza responds to Sonam Kapoor's 'these people' remark

Published on: Date Unknown
Source: Unknown

In a recent event, Genelia D'Souza addressed remarks made by Sonam Kapoor regarding a specific group of people, shedding light on the implications of such comments in the media landscape.

  • Genelia emphasized the importance of choosing words carefully in public forums.
  • She highlighted the impact of celebrity remarks on public perception.
  • The exchange underscores ongoing discussions about media responsibility.
"Words have power, and we must be aware of how they shape our narratives." - Genelia D'Souza

This incident reflects a growing awareness among celebrities about their influence and the weight their comments carry in the public sphere.

item.title: Horoscope Today: Astrological prediction for December 23, 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Horoscope Today: Astrological prediction for December 23, 2024

Date: December 23, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The article provides daily horoscope predictions for various zodiac signs, highlighting specific challenges and opportunities individuals might face based on astrological insights.

  • Aries: New fitness regimen and positive family decisions.
  • Taurus: Successful fitness efforts and a potential academic shift.
  • Gemini: Speedy recovery post-surgery and positive love developments.
  • Cancer: Consistent routine needed for health, potential romantic interests.
  • Leo: Misunderstandings in family but success in academics.
  • Virgo: Fun outings planned, may meet interesting people.
  • Libra: Meditation helps ease mental stress and promises rewards for hard work.
  • Scorpio: New health approaches and academic success likely.
  • Sagittarius: Financial security with new opportunities ahead.
  • Capricorn: Motivation to get fit and potential income growth.
  • Aquarius: Better income forecast but office politics to avoid.
  • Pisces: Patience required for financial improvement, with academic excellence ahead.
"Starting your day by knowing what’s coming your way can be beneficial."

Embrace the insights provided by your daily horoscope to navigate challenges and seize opportunities with confidence.

item.description:

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 18: Allu Arjun house vandalised over stampede case even as film makes ₹1063 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 18: Protesters vandalised Allu Arjun's Hyderabad house

Date: Dec 22, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The article discusses the impressive box office performance of Pushpa 2 while highlighting the vandalism of Allu Arjun's house due to ongoing issues related to a stampede incident.

  • Pushpa 2 has grossed approximately ₹1063.64 crore net in India by the 18th day of its release.
  • The film collected ₹33.99 crore on its third Saturday, showing strong performance.
  • Allu Arjun's house was vandalized by protesters related to the stampede case that occurred during the film's premiere.
  • The actor has expressed his condolences and pledged financial assistance to the victim's family.
“Everyone has seen what happened at our house today. But it is time for us to act accordingly.” - Allu Arjuna's father

The incident raises concerns over fan conduct at film events and the implications on public safety.

item.title: After Mukesh Khanna, Kumar Vishwas takes a dig at Shatrughan Sinha and Sonakshi Sinha: 'Aapke ghar ka naa - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Kumar Vishwas Critiques Shatrughan and Sonakshi Sinha

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Times of India

Kumar Vishwas has taken a jab at Shatrughan Sinha and Sonakshi Sinha, pointing out the irony of their family name while addressing the notion of domestic matters.

  • Vishwas highlighted the contradiction in their family's traditional values and current situation.
  • His statement alludes to a broader commentary on family respect and values.
  • This critique comes amid ongoing discussions regarding celebrity accountability.
“Aapke ghar ka naam to Ramayan ho aur aapke ghar ki Shree Lakshmi ko koi aur uthakar le jaye.”

This incident underscores the tension between public personas and private lives among celebrities.

item.title: What Happened Between Blake Lively And Justin Baldoni? A Full Breakdown Of The 'It Ends With Us' Feud - News18
item.description:
What Happened Between Blake Lively And Justin Baldoni? A Full Breakdown Of The 'It Ends With Us' Feud

Publication Date: December 22, 2024 | Source: News18

The article discusses the legal battle between Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni, stemming from allegations of sexual harassment and a toxic working environment during the filming of 'It Ends With Us.'

  • Blake Lively filed a lawsuit against Justin Baldoni in December 2024, alleging sexual harassment and retaliation.
  • Despite the film's success, reports surfaced of on-set tensions and personal grievances between the two actors.
  • Allegations include unwanted physical contact and inappropriate discussions by Baldoni.
  • Lively claims there was a smear campaign initiated against her following her complaints.
  • Colleen Hoover, the novel's author, expressed support for Lively, while Baldoni's legal team denied all allegations.
  • Baldoni has reportedly been dropped by his talent agency following the lawsuit.
“I hope that my legal action helps pull back the curtain on these sinister retaliatory tactics… and helps protect others who may be targeted.” - Blake Lively

The allegations have sparked significant public interest and debate regarding workplace conduct in the film industry.

item.title: Allu Arjun's father talks about their Hyderabad home being vandalised over Pushpa 2 stampede case - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Vandalism at Allu Arjun's Home After Pushpa 2 Incident

Date: Dec 22, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Allu Arjun's father, Allu Aravind, addressed the press after protesters vandalized their Hyderabad home, demanding money for a victim of a recent stampede at a film event. The police have arrested the offenders and are prepared for further actions.

  • The incident occurred due to demands related to a stampede at a film event promoting Pushpa 2.
  • Protesters vandalized the property, breaking flower pots and pelting tomatoes.
  • Allu Arjun stated he was unaware of the woman’s death until the next day after the event.
“Everyone has seen what happened at our house today. But it is time for us to act accordingly. Now is not the right time for us to react to anything.” - Allu Aravind

In conclusion, the incident underscores the intense pressure facing celebrities following tragic events and the public's expectation for accountability.

item.title: 'Mahatma Gandhi was Pakistan's father of nation': Playback singer Abhijeet Bhattacharya - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Playback singer Abhijeet Bhattacharya was speaking about legendary music composer RD Burman, who gave him his first break in the industry.

Date: Dec 22, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Playback singer Abhijeet Bhattacharya stirred controversy by calling Mahatma Gandhi the 'Father of Pakistan' during a recent podcast. His comments sparked a debate about Gandhi's role in India's independence and his legacy.

  • Abhijeet stated, 'Pancham Da was bigger than Mahatma Gandhi.'
  • He claimed that Gandhi was recognised as Pakistan's Father rather than India's.
  • His remarks were made while discussing the late music composer RD Burman.
  • The comments have drawn attention and polarized opinions on social media.
"Mahatma Gandhi was the Father of the Nation for Pakistan, not for India." - Abhijeet Bhattacharya

Abhijeet Bhattacharya, known for his contributions to Bollywood music, has created significant impact through his remarks on a national figure. His statements will likely continue to provoke discussions about Gandhi's legacy.

item.title: Abhijeet Bhattacharya says Mahatma Gandhi was the father of the nation for Pakistan, not India: 'RD Burma - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Abhijeet Bhattacharya says Mahatma Gandhi was the father of the nation for Pakistan, not India: 'RD Burman was bigger than Gandhi'

Publication Date: [Insert date here] Source: Times of India

In a controversial statement, singer Abhijeet Bhattacharya declares that Mahatma Gandhi is regarded as the father of the nation in Pakistan rather than in India, while asserting that music composer RD Burman was a more significant figure than Gandhi.

  • Bhattacharya emphasizes the perception of Gandhi in Pakistan.
  • He compares Gandhi's legacy to that of RD Burman, suggesting Burman's cultural impact was greater.
  • The comments have generated debate regarding Gandhi's legacy in India and Pakistan.
'RD Burman was bigger than Gandhi.'

This statement raises questions about the cultural and historical narratives surrounding these iconic figures, prompting discussions among fans and scholars alike.

item.title: Dulquer Salmaan pens romantic note for wife Amaal on 13th wedding anniversary: ‘As long as I have your hand to hold…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Dulquer Salmaan pens romantic note for wife Amaal on 13th wedding anniversary: ‘As long as I have your hand to hold…’

Date: Dec 22, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Dulquer Salmaan celebrated his 13th wedding anniversary with Amaal, reflecting on their journey together through a heartfelt Instagram post.

  • Dulquer shared his anniversary post capturing their evolution from husband and wife to parents.
  • He expressed how Amaal's support helps him navigate life's challenges.
  • The couple has a daughter named Maryam Ameerah Salmaan.
“From trying to get used to calling each other husband and wife, to now being known as Maryams papa and mamma we've come a long way.” - Dulquer Salmaan

The couple received an outpour of love and compliments from fans and friends on social media.

Badshah Shares Cryptic Post Amid Diljit Dosanjh-AP Dhillon Feud: 'Please Don’t Make The Mistakes That We Made'

'Please don’t make the mistakes that we made.'

item.title: Allu Arjun's Hyderabad house vandalised by protesters protesters over Pushpa 2 stampede case - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Arjun's Hyderabad House Vandalised by Protesters Over 'Pushpa 2' Stampede

Date: Dec 22, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

On Sunday, protesters vandalised Allu Arjun's Hyderabad home, demanding compensation for victims of a recent stampede linked to the premiere of his film 'Pushpa 2'.

  • Protesters, identifying as OU JAC, vandalised the property in Jubilee Hills.
  • They demanded ₹1 crore for the family of a stampede victim.
  • The protest included pelting stones and breaking flower pots.
  • Eight individuals were arrested at the scene by police.
  • The incident stemmed from a previous stampede at a film premiere that resulted in one death.
“We demand that Allu Arjun take care of the late Revathi’s family. Why did so many film personalities visit him when he came out of jail after being there for 6 months, but none of them cared when a woman died.” - Protester

The tensions between Allu Arjun's fans and the protesters highlight broader issues surrounding celebrity accountability in tragic events.

item.title: Allu Arjun's Hyderabad house vandalised by protesters demanding money for Pushpa 2 stampede victim's family - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Protesters Vandalise Allu Arjun's Hyderabad Home Demanding Compensation for Stampede Victim

Date: December 22, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Protesters from the OU JAC vandalised Allu Arjun's house, demanding he pay ₹1 crore to the family of a stampede victim during the Pushpa 2 premiere.

  • Protesters vandalised Arjun's home in Hyderabad, throwing stones and breaking flower pots.
  • The demands were linked to the tragic death of a woman during the Pushpa 2 premiere.
  • The incident led to several arrests, with the police responding to the vandalism.
“We demand that Allu Arjun take care of the late Revathi’s family... We will not let you go anywhere if these demands aren’t met.”

The incident highlights the ongoing tensions surrounding the Pushpa 2 premiere and raises questions about celebrity accountability.

item.title: Tomotoes Thrown, Protest Outside Allu Arjun's Home Over Stampede Death - NDTV
item.description:
Protest Erupts Outside Allu Arjun's Home Following Stampede Tragedy

Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: NDTV

A large protest occurred outside the residence of film actor Allu Arjun, ignited by a recent stampede at a movie premiere that resulted in a tragic death.

  • The protest was led by individuals claiming to be students from Osmania University.
  • During the protest, demonstrators threw tomatoes and damaged property.
  • The stampede incident happened on December 4 at Sandhya Theatre during the premiere of 'Pushpa 2'.
  • A woman died in the incident, and her eight-year-old son remains hospitalized in a coma.
  • Criticism has been directed at Allu Arjun for allegedly disregarding police orders at the event, which may have contributed to the chaos.
“He had even waved from his car's sun-roof on his way in and out, holding a roadshow of sorts and triggering a stampede-like situation.” - Chief Minister Revanth Reddy

The protest underscores public outrage over the handling of the premiere and the resulting tragedy, highlighting a need for accountability in event management.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 18 early report: Allu Arjun-starrer breaks Baahubali 2’s seven-year domestic record, takes pole position - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 18 early report: Allu Arjun-starrer breaks Baahubali 2’s seven-year domestic record, takes pole position

Publication Date: December 5, 2024 Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2 continues to break records, surpassing Baahubali 2's seven-year-old benchmark as the highest-grossing Indian film in the domestic market, marking a remarkable achievement for the film and its cast.

  • The film has crossed the Rs 1000 crore mark in the domestic market, becoming only the second film to do so after Baahubali 2.
  • Pushpa 2 has grossed over Rs 1500 crore globally, making it the highest-grossing film of 2024.
  • Early reports indicate the film earned Rs 22.7 crore on day 18, raising its total to Rs 1052.5 crore.
  • Despite its success, the film faces controversies due to a tragic incident during its premiere in Hyderabad.
“Pushpa 2 continues to mark its strong presence across the country.”

The phenomenal success of Pushpa 2 illustrates its significance in contemporary Indian cinema, reflecting both its popularity and the challenges faced due to surrounding controversies.

item.title: Venkat Prabhu : I narrated another version of The GOAT to Rajinikanth - 123telugu
item.description:
Venkat Prabhu: I narrated another version of The GOAT to Rajinikanth

Published on Dec 22, 2024 6:00 pm IST

Tamil director Venkat Prabhu discusses his original vision for The GOAT with Rajinikanth and details about how the project evolved.

  • Venkat Prabhu initially envisioned The GOAT with Superstar Rajinikanth.
  • The film, featuring Thalapathy Vijay, grossed around Rs. 450 crore globally.
  • Rajinikanth liked the story, but the project did not materialize with him.
  • A different version of the story was presented to Vijay, including a dual role concept.
"I narrated a different version to Rajinikanth, who liked it, but I didn't present the dual role concept at that time." - Venkat Prabhu

Ultimately, the collaboration led to The GOAT's successful release with Vijay, though fans were left wanting more from the original concept.

item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 1 Advance Booking (3 Days To Go): Sells Over 5,200 Tickets In 7 Hours, Varun Dhawan Starrer Aims For A Good Start - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 1 Advance Booking (3 Days To Go)

Publication Date & Source: December 2024, Koimoi

Baby John is just three days away from hitting the big screen. Varun Dhawan takes on a full-fledged action role for the first time, and anticipation is building. However, it faces tough competition from Pushpa 2. Here’s a detailed advance booking report for day 1!

  • The film has sold around 5,300 tickets by 5 PM IST, grossing 18.70 lakh+ through advance bookings.
  • The film's pre-sales started at 10 AM IST.
  • With around 2,500 shows currently scheduled, more are expected to be added soon, potentially boosting ticket sales.
  • Varun Dhawan's last release, Bhediya, had a day 1 advance booking of 1.85 crore gross.
“The film should ideally look to close its pre-sales at 6-7 crores.”

Baby John is gearing up for its release amid high expectations. The success in advance bookings will be crucial for its box office performance.

item.description:
Bhavika Sharma opens up on Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin generation leap & exiting show: 'I have..'

Published: Sunday, December 22, 2024 at 11:08 AM

Bhavika Sharma, known for her role as Savi in 'Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin', addressed speculation regarding another generation leap and the exit of cast members, emphasizing that she has not been informed of any such developments.

  • Rumors surfaced about the show undergoing a generation leap and a cast revamp.
  • Bhavika Sharma confirmed she has only seen this news in the media and has no further information.
  • Previous instances show that showmakers have made decisions about leaps without notifying the cast in advance.
  • Ankita Khare is also reported to be quitting the show.
“Yes, I too have read about this news in the media only.” - Bhavika Sharma

While Bhavika has dismissed the rumors for now, the history of the show suggests unpredictable changes can occur.
